#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

//dp kinda

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;

            string s;
            int x;

            int found[100002];
            for(int i = 0; i < 100002; i++)
            found[i] = -1;

            int value = 0;

    while(n--)
    {
        cin>>s>>x;

        if(s=="found")
            found[x] = value;

        else if(found[x] >= 0)
        {
            value = max(value , found[x]+x);
            found[x] = -1;
        }
    }

    cout<<value<<endl;
}
